In many countries, queer people avoid healthcare out of fear of discrimination, misgendering, or violence. This isnt neglect its systemic exclusion. A feminist health agenda must be queer-inclusive by design, not by exception.

Feminism without queer liberation is incomplete. LBTQI+ people deserve safe, competent & respectful healthcare. 30 years after Beijing, were still demanding health systems that affirm gender diversity & bodily autonomy.
